title: Former Deputy National Security Adviser Files Lawsuit Over Impeachment Inquiry Subpoena
text:
WASHINGTON -- President Trump’s former deputy national security adviser Charles Kupperman, a key witness in the continuing impeachment inquiry, filed a lawsuit late Friday asking a federal judge to rule on whether he must testify after the White House claimed immunity for the president’s closest advisers.

“Dr. Kupperman cannot satisfy the competing and irreconcilable demands of both the Legislative and Executive Branches, and there is no controlling judicial authority definitively establishing which Branch’s command should...
description: President Trump’s former deputy national security adviser filed a lawsuit asking a federal judge to rule on whether he must testify in the House impeachment inquiry after the White House claimed immunity for the president’s closest advisers.
